DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics of clarithromycin which is used for premature infants with ureaplasma.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of Clarithromycin in Very Low Birth Weight (VLBW)
DOC.criteria: birthweight < 1500gm or GA < 32 weeks transtracheal aspirate/gastric juice ; ureaplasma/mycoplasma(+) sepsis, hypotension, shock major congenital anomaly
